question_stem: An urn has n white and m black balls. Balls are randomly withdrawn without replacement, one at a time, until a total of k white balls have been withdrawn, where k <= n. The random variable X is the total number of balls that have been withdrawn. Which of the following events is equivalent to {X = r}, where r is an integer in the support of X?
